messages.message: Yeah, not working for me as well.
I'll look into this - it was broken on dogfood after the hugo migration and then I fixed it, so not sure why it's broken on prod now

@Jessica looks like request / code formatted sections are broken now in scheduler section
https://dogfood.instabase.com/docs/reference/apis/scheduler/
I just fixed it for Scheduler in this PR https://github.com/instabase/instabase-docs/pull/642

It might be broken in many other places. Would be good to check.
The issue is if a formatted section doesn't have a label indicating shell/bash,etc, it renders with white font on light background :slightly_smiling_face:
@Anil do you think there would be any rule of thumb for finding instances like this? I can look through all of the api pages to start

I just searched for ```  in VSCode, this happens at a lot of places.
For example flow v3 guide Flow V3 Guide | Instabase Documentation (https://dogfood.instabase.com/docs/guides/core/flow-v3/)
Might be easier to just fix the CSS
Yeah just tried that and found a bunch of places... let me see what I can do
search fix is deployed to UAT, can somebody help verify? here is my test
